subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray survived severe cramping to win, Simona Halep needed three sets to advance and Venus Williams overcame errors and a pesky bee, but No. 21 Mikhail Youzhny was upset by Nick Kyrgios.
snippet: Andy Murray survived severe cramping to win, Simona Halep needed three sets to advance and Venus Williams overcame errors and a pesky bee, but No. 21 Mikhail Youzhny was upset by Nick Kyrgios.
